name: Light Carrier
description:
Story:

You are the One, accompanied by Fairy, who is brave enough to start your own journey in the Forest of Faries.

The game was made by Weaver Games for the 4th Klagenfurt Winter Jam.

Team:

Management: Gáspár Virágos (KasparB)
Design: Gáspár Virágos (KasparB), Ksenia Garshina (KseniaGa)
Story: Gáspár Virágos (KasparB)
Programming: Dominik Imsirovic (dominikimsirovic), Nikola Stoimenov (coco1522), Ksenia Garshina (KseniaGa)
Art: Ihor Pravdin (pravdin), Reza Ebrahimi (Reza12121)
Music: Dominik Imsirovic (dominikimsirovic), Reza Ebrahimi (Reza12121)
Sound: Reza Ebrahimi (Reza12121)
